definition: Xiangtan prefecture level city in Hunan

sentences.english: On day Cui Ning went out to work in Xiantan.

sentences.english: Third is the area of Xiangtan county-level tax authorities to conduct empirical analysis of the performance evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 三是對湘潭市縣級地稅機關進行績效評價實證分析。
